author: {'steamid': '76561198046502352', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1457277197}
review:
Um dann nun auch (endlich) alle Sakura Titel von meiner To-Do Liste durch zu haben, habe ich mich auch noch an Sakura Fantasy heran gewagt. Theoretisch würde zur Vollständigkeit noch Sakura Beach fehlen, davon habe ich allerdings nie einen Key bekommen und kaufen werde ich es mir sicherlich nicht. Um schon einmal etwas vorweg zu nehmen, kann man hier dann wirklich mal sagen: Das Beste kommt zum Schluss. Auch wenn es nicht schwer war, die anderen Teile zu überbieten…

    [quote]Titel: Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1
    Entwickler: Winged Cloud
    Genre: Fantasy, Ecchi
    Länge: ~2h
    Premiere: 29. Mai 2015

    Story:
    The new visual novel from the makers of Sakura Spirit and Sakura Angels.

    Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1 is an exciting visual novel fantasy adventure where you decide the development of the story by the choices you make.

    It is the tale of an aspiring female protagonist who wishes to aim to become a knight.[/quote]

[h1]Handlung:[/h1]

Winged Cloud wagt sich hier mal an eine längere Geschichte heran. Chapter 1 dauert allerdings trotzdem mal wieder nicht länger als 2h zu lesen. Aber dadurch, dass die Handlung auf mehrere Teile aufgesplittet wird, gibt es mal ein halbwegs vernünftiges Pacing und es wird nicht einfach von einer Ecchi Szene zur nächsten geeilt. Ob die Handlung nun sonderlich berauschend ist, lasse ich mal dahin gestellt.

Die Protagonistin möchte gerne Ritterin werden….. Landet allerdings nur als Wache im Schloss. Hier trifft sie dann auf die Empress und knüpft Kontakte zur ihr. Als dann ein Stern vom Himmel fällt, melden sie und ihre Freundin, sowie Chefin sich freiwillig um den besagten Stern für die Empress zu holen.

Der Storyansatz klingt soweit erst einmal nicht schlecht, bei der Umsetzung hapert es aber immer noch. Die Novel braucht viel zu lange, bis endlich mal irgendwas passiert, was nicht zu einer neuen Ecchi Szene führt. Was sehr störend dieses Mal ist, sind die ganzen Entscheidungen. Gefühlt (und teilweise auch tatsächlich) muss man alle 10 Zeilen Dialog eine Entscheidung treffen, die in 90% der Fälle keinerlei Auswirkung haben. Eine Zeile Text ändert sich nach manchen Entscheidungen und das war’s dann auch. Das ist doch wirklich ein schlechter Witz. Es stört ungemein den Lesefluss ständig dann auf etwas klicken zu müssen, was 0 Einfluss hat. Letztendlich ist hier dann auch wieder das Problem, dass Teile der Story durch Plot ersetzt wurden.

[h1]Illustrationen:[/h1]

Bei der Bewertung der Illustrationen, kann ich mich eigentlich nur das wiederholen, was bereits beim letzten Sakura * Review gesagt wurde: Alles ordentlich und sauber, aber es fehlt die Liebe zum Detail. Die CGs sind gewohnt fokussiert auf die Oberweite und die Charakterdarstellungen haben die üblichen paar Posen mit variierenden Gesichtsausdrücken. Selbst bei dem Ecchi Anteil hat man mittlerweile das Gefühl, als wenn es sich hier schon aus den anderen Sakura Novels wiederholt.

[h1]Charaktere:[/h1]

Bei den Charakteren gibt es eine positive Überraschung zu verzeichnen. Anstatt dem Waschlappenprotagonisten wie sonst, gibt es dieses mal einen komplett weiblichen Cast und die Protagonistin jammert auch nicht nur durch die Gegend. Leider ist sie aber nicht die beste Charakterein vom Cast, sondern vor allem die Empress ist es, die es irgendwie interessant gemacht hat. Sie scheint die einzige zu sein, die wirklich ein bisschen Persönlichkeit verpasst bekommen hat. Alle anderen Charaktere sind wieder eher recht emotionslos und weisen nicht wirklich Tiefgang auf.

[h1]Sound:[/h1]

Beim Sound weiß ich wirklich nicht mehr was ich schreiben soll. Daher machen wir das ganz einfach:
☑ generisch
☑ schnell wieder vergessen
☐ begeisternd

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]

Well. Alles in allem ist es einfach nur ein weiteres Sakura Game. Mittlerweile sollte hinreichend bekannt sein, was man bei diesen Noveln erwarten kann. In dem Sinne tut sich Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1 nun auch nicht positiver hervor, als die anderen Vertreter, ist sogar was die Entscheidungen angeht schlechter. Allerdings hat man sich dieses mal ein bisschen mehr Zeit für die Handlung genommen, was ganz angenehm ist. Auch die Charaktere haben mir hier ein bisschen besser gefallen. Die Protagonistin ist schon einmal eine positive Steigerung und auch bei den anderen Charakteren wurde anscheinend ein bisschen mehr Arbeit herein gesteckt. Es gibt hier zwar kein Fluffy Tail, trotzdem ist es bisher doch von den Sakura Games das [strike]beste[/strike] am wenigsten schlechte.

[h1]5/10[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198161899377', 'num_games_owned': 376, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 596, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 596, 'last_played': 1457300310}
review:
[h1] ДО РУСИФИКАТОРА [/h1]
Боже, это новелла из всех мне понравилась больше всего. Юри, о да. наконец-то чистый юри. Это меня несказанно радует. Та же восхитительная рисовка. Сюжет шикарен. Большое кол-во выборов. Я под впечатлениями. Очень понравилась ВН.
[h1] ПОСЛЕ УСТАНОВКИ РУСИФИКАТОРА И... НЕКОТОРЫХ ПАТЧЕЙ... [/h1]
На английском, конечно, многое уходило от меня. Сейчас, перепройдя я открыл кое-что новое для себя. Где были локализаторы, а именно РАnТОР, Cij, krogon500? Но это неважно, огромное вам спасибо.
Многое указывает на то, каким будет продолжение. Но. Никаких спойлеров и догадок. Сами поиграйте ;3
Сейчас я очень расстроен, что нет карточек. А так же, больших развилок сюжета, как в том же Бесконечном Лете. А ведь для каждой девушки можно было сделать отдельную ветку, рассказывающую об истории владелицы "ветки". Это заставляло бы играть и играть в нее не раз, и не два. Ну и, так же стоит добавить ачивментов. "Связь с Императрицей", например, где нужно... связаться с ней. Аналогично и с другими девами. В целом, я так же доволен этой частью, жду продолжения. WCloud, вы - чудо.
[h1] И СНОВА Я, НО В ЭТОТ РАЗ ПОСЛЕ ДОБАВЛЕНИЯ КАРТОЧЕК, СМАЙЛОВ, ФОНОВ [/h1]
Ай, хитрецы. Люди не раз проходили ее наверное. К примеру, я. Сначала на английском, потом с русификатор и R18. Теперь перепройду ради значка и всего, что к нему причитаются. Ай, молодцы. Знают, как заставить людей играть не один раз в их продукт. Просто мои аплодисменты.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104214038', 'num_games_owned': 2125, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1649154370}
review:
This Sakura game has the best story out of all the Sakura games I've played so far. Hands down. I think the fact that this is the first game in a longer series made the story much better. The first half of this game is all about introducing us to the characters, getting to known them and their backstories a bit, and just getting a general feel for the setting. The second half is where things get actiony and they tease ever so slightly at what is to come in later installments. The writing in this is so much better than previous games it's astounding. This might be my favorite Sakura game so far, either this or Swim Club cause that one is super great too. The art is perfect as always, Wanaca never disappoints. I'm excited for Chapter 2 and hope the wait for it won't be too long.

I also really liked that the MC is female for a change. It gives the game a much different feel than the other Sakura games. The MC also has a fun little power that lets her basically project her mind and become the best peeping tom ever. Hilarity follows.

Update: Winged Cloud just released an uncensored patch like the one for Swim Club.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131887849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 591, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1460889789}
review:
I will say this upfront. I am not very well-versed when it comes to visual novels. Not particularly a fan of them, either.  Largely because I generally don't consider them to be games. Look at Skyrim, Devil May Cry, or Metal Gear Solid. All of those are games. Because you take active role in what happens in those games. Visual novels, on the other hand, are products where you generally read a wall of text with characters on screen making facial expressions to match their emotions. I prefer my games where I do something other than just sit and read. If I wanted to read, I would read a book. But that's a different topic. Right now, I am going to review Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1.

Sakura Fantasy is a game that draws you in with the promise of anime girls in various states of undress and sexuality. And for the first few hours, it seems to be just that. Our protagonist heroine, Raelin, is a knight-to-be, born with the ability of far-seeing that allows her to seeing into places that is not in her line of sight hence the name. Which everyone assumes she uses to spy on other people in their private moments. And despite her denial when asked directly, she actually does. 

But is it truly a boob/yuri-fest and nothing more? It is true that those exist. But it's not all that this novel is about. It delivers a compelling story with an interesting setting. If you can look past the nudity, and are able to ignore that "itchy" feeling you get inbetween your legs.

I don't like being that person but... If you are a fan of anime, like anime girls and/or possess an artistic appreciation for the female body, there is a good chance you will like this game. If you don't like the female physique being treated as a mere object, dislike anime or nudity in any form of media, it's more than likely that you will hate this "game". This is a "game" targeted for open-minded individuals who have no qualms about nudity in their stories/games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084237526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1445477485}
review:
While this is the first VN i have read on steam, it is not the first one i have read; so i know what does and doesn't make a good VN. I am happy to say, this one ticks all the right boxes for a VN. 

With an interesting background and an interesting cast of characters, this fantasy story did pull me in with it's music and background arts. while some people might complain about the partial nudity in some of the arts, i find them kinda entertaining to view, since most NV doesn't push those limits ;3

The story as a whole is about 2-3 hours in length, depending on how fast you read, and with multiple different pathways (choices) adds alot of replayability (or should it be Re-Readability?) to the overall story. while it does to me kinda finish abrupty the story, it does leave alot of interesting plots to continue in the future with chapter 2 (as well as more after that), and comparing this as Chapter 1, to other NVs, it is quite long. 

overall this is a very good NV, with alot of potental, we will just have to see in chapter 2 ;3

8.6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198126468970', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 464, 'last_played': 1505017980}
review:
Fun game, At first I thought the choices made no difference but as I was play it deeply into the story, I did notice some slight changes. But the most impactful change with your choices is 2 CG arts within the game you can only get by chosing wisely.

The story focuses on a female knight in training named Raelin, There are like 4 girls you can romance in the game ( actually 5 if you count r@pe ).
Raelin has a rare gift known as farseeing, giving her the ability to spy on someone's most private moments without them knowing it. but because of this rare gift, She not well trusted among her comrades. I would say more but this is a game where you should expierience the story instead of me telling you.

This game will take you about 4 to 5 hours to complete, but if you are trying to get all CG Arts ( which you should ) It'll take about an extra 2 hours to 100% everything!

This is a fun game ( well visual novel ) filled with tons of sexy fan service and an interesting story to back it up. This is the first chapter of the Sakura Fantasy series so there's bound to be more chapters coming soon.

If you love Anime, a good story, beautiful art, fan service & hentai ( There are hentai moments in this game but worry not, Nothing besides cleverly censored naked bodies and bondage like moments ) You'll thoroughly enjoy this game.

Keep in mind that this game ISN'T for kids! Overall, This is a fun and enjoyable little gem that's worth a purchase!

Also this game is 100% Yuri! ^-^

author: {'steamid': '76561198040319157', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1433881594}
review:
Mmm... Chocolate...
Oh, sorry, I got a bit distracted there... I'm hungry! Don't judge me!
But in all seriousness... This first chapter of the Fantasy-series proves that the team behind it can actually make a decent, somewhat interesting story that doesn't rely entirely on fanservice to keep you going. Don't get me wrong, there's still plenty of it to go around, including a whole lot of chocolate...
Well, there are people who dream about literally swimming in cash, so chocolate isn't so far off if you think about it...
What makes this story different from the other Sakura novels currently released, you may ask? A female avatar. That's right, you play a girl in this one! And it doesn't take long for you to realise it either... I must say, putting on underwear isn't that time-consuming...
But yeah, you play a woman in a regiment seemingly composed entirely of other women, including a rock-hard drill instructor. (10 points if you get that joke once you start reading.) And of course, you end up on an adventure in a desolate swampland... What is this? I thought this was supposed to be a light-hearted erotica. Oh wait, perverted slimes... never mind.
But once again, there's no actual nudity in this game. There are scenes which imply nudity, and some slightly exposing pictures to keep you running. But that's as far as Steam will allow it to go... Oh, and some girls kissing. That works too.
But I'm going to stop rambling on now and simply get to the point: A decent story to give some foundation to the more or less erotic pictures you'll come across over the... say, 30 minutes or so it'll take to read through this thing once. But don't feel ashamed if your total time clocks higher than that: There are plenty of routes to take for more (or less) fanservice! Just don't expect any of your choices to have much of an impact on the story... It is a novel, not a "choose-your-own-adventure" game.
Anyway, with all that said, I'm going to go find something to eat... I wonder if there's any chocolate in the fridge...

author: {'steamid': '76561198095921674', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1438786281}
review:
作为sakura系列的第三部，sakura fantasy chapter 1在剧情上下了很大功夫，当你在阅读人物对话和剧情时已然有了一种欣赏一部轻小说的感觉，不像前2部那种快餐式的故事情节。chapter 1里设下了诸多悬念，牢牢地抓住了玩家的好奇心。世界观的设定，人物性格与内心的刻画也相对到位，加上轻松愉快的日常也富有幽默感。依旧是男性向，而这部却成了百合（四球相撞，两唇相接，噫！）原画方面依旧是本系列的亮点，卖肉卖到飞起（从头硬到尾），妹子们的胸部，大腿也是十分的肉（xia）感（zuo），光（you）滑（ni），“美轮美奂”。让人按捺不住内心的兽性，十分有扑上去好好揉捏一番（prprprpr）的冲动（噫~变态！），“这x我能玩一年”这类的。实在好奇英国那群基佬是怎么做出这么绅士的游戏的，这画风不下海可惜了QAQ。总之这一部使人眼前一亮，不再长按空格，而是慢慢品味。很期待sakura系列的进步，同样盼望着chapter 2的到来。
另附汉化补丁下载地址      http://pan.baidu.com/s/1pJn5Pof    直接解压到游戏文件根目录覆盖即可

author: {'steamid': '76561198032143607', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1435917260}
review:
Sakura Fantasy in Chapter 1 has done a great work so far. It deserves a 4.2/5 for good reasons. There are more choices than previous games, there is a good story going here and the choices seem more relevant. Looking forward to more. The CG as usual great. They keep this up, a 5 might be closer than they think. The idea of the story and setting is quite nice and the characters grow more in but as the story goes it all depends. I look forward to chapter 2.  I recommend it. It has definitely taken steps up from previous games how it goes from here we'll see.
As far as this goes, hope more characters join in and the story continues to grow as well unlike previous ones.
Also would like to see if they do have an end route after transfer of saves, that helps a lot more crossing fun.
If they ever cross characters from previous games though and add them to route and cg, that'd be interesting.
However you got to play it yourself to understand. This game got me aware of the setting more so it's a good start.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079352480', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1435440145}
review:
Unfortunately, I've played all the Sakura games thus far, and while this one is the best one out of the three, it still fails to meet my expectations for a proper visual novel game.

The writing is a lot better, focusing more on dialogue and development of the story and characters, but even then, what they've done isn't great by any standard. The characters don't really stand out, and what little of their personalities we see aren't really touched on. The world isn't built up enough, simply going to the old 'World is in turmoil, and we live secluded in a city' plot, that, while it can be an interesting way to set up your story, it can fail hard when not given more depth. If the writer had taken more time to flesh out the chapter, then maybe it could've pulled it out of the blandness that it ended up becoming.

The art is better than before, giving characters more poses and backgrounds more of an immersive feel, but, overall, it's not really something we haven't seen done better by other developers with less of an art budget. Not to mention the CGs tend to leave something to be desired (and not just nudity, haha). They just seem a bit lackluster for what an artist can really do. They're the images that aren't bound by the need to be compatible with multiple poses and animation, so they can throw a lot more detail in, but they just go for the same amount that we can see in the character sprites, which is disappointing.

The sound/music isn't anything that we haven't heard before in the previous games, and it's not great, but not bad, either.

And do NOT get me started on visual novels that lack complex decision trees. THAT'S where the fun in playing them lies, because you feel the weight of your decisions firsthand, thus making you think about what you decide what to do next, rather than just 'pick your scene/heroine' gameplay, which can be interesting, if the writing and art can make up for it, but referring back to my previous statements, they don't.

Whenever I play one of the Sakura games, I always feel like I'm reading an anime, or rather that Winged Cloud really wants their visual novel to be an anime rather than a visual novel. Others can do it quite well (e.g. Steins;Gate), but if Sakura Fantasy were to become one by some extreme stroke of luck, it would be half-assed, even then.

The developers of the Sakura series need to seriously get their heads out of their asses, and learn from their mistakes, rather than producing more bland wastes of time that just put visual novel games in even more of a bad light than they already are.

All I'm glad for is that Steam refunds are possible, because this game isn't worth the money I spent to play it, and unless Winged Cloud manages to make something worth my time, I'll never purchase their games again, and I hope that no one else does either, because no person deserves to have to play through a game as boring as this.

review:
sakura fantasy : si discosta da i precedenti per essere raccontato in terza persona infatti il protagonista non sarà più il tizio che noi impersoniamo che poi non vedremo mai, ma impersoneremo Raelin (una tizia a quanto pare lesbica, ma diciamo che la storia ti da il beneficio del dubbio).
questo capitolo sarà molto più vario dei precedenti e avremo a disposizioni delle scelte più azzecate rispetto a sakura anglels ma sempre per la maggior parte inutili, però in alcuni casi portano a cambiare intere situazioni che anche se in "piccoli" dettagli faranno la differenza :D. i personaggi sono di più e avremo a disposizione una ampia scelta di tipe ogniuna caratterizzata a dovere. ve lo consiglio più degli altri due, all'inizio sarà anche lento ma poi c'è il rush di eventi e cose belle che vi catturerà ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198037003719', 'num_games_owned': 4057, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1434983188}
review:
《Sakura Fantasy》是一款由歐美開發團隊Winged Cloud製作而成的視覺小說遊戲，本作分為兩大章節，第二章節將在二零一五年的暑假期間正式發售，《Sakura Fantasy》從作品名稱來看似乎是前作《Sakura Angels》和《Sakura Spririt》的延續之作，不過三者間的故事劇情毫無關連，玩家可以自由選擇作品的閱讀順序。就像是所有的奇幻冒險故事一樣，本作故事劇情發生在到處都能看到城堡與騎士的中古世紀，某些被造物者選上的人會擁有名為天賦的神秘魔法力量，女主角萊琳的天賦是能看穿一切的千里眼，生性調皮愛玩的她總是會利用自己的天賦偷窺他人隱私，也因為這種壞習慣使她成為軍中的頭號麻煩人物，沒人想要跟她進一步交往。


萊琳在軍中的唯一親友是身為書記官一職的金髮騎士格溫，天生擁有強大魔法天賦的她，不僅飽讀詩書熟識各種神話寓言，還能操縱閃電風暴重創敵人，格溫似乎有嚴重的潔癖，玩家三不五時就會看到她很享受的洗著熱水澡服務觀眾的眼睛。王國的居民本以為能在高牆的守護之下安穩生活，直到萊琳被擁有石膚防禦天賦的直屬長官凱拉升遷為議事廳守衛，因緣際會在宮殿中碰見實際年齡超過千歲的女王，她對萊琳說出的一句話改變了王國的命運：『星星總會墜落。』當晚一顆巨大彗星降落在城牆外的廢棄村落，女王馬上下令將自告奮用出征的守備隊長凱拉、千里眼萊琳和書記官格溫組成了三人遠征隊，目的是要到達彗星墜落的地點，防止邪惡力量取得不屬於他們的力量。


本作遊戲長度可以說是櫻花系列最短的一部作品，雖然還不清楚第二章節的遊戲長度為何，但筆者猜測大約也是落在一小時以內，唯一值得讚賞之處就是本作的CG質量可以說是系列作之冠，劇情也首次對性愛成分有所描述，玩家會看到兩名少女一絲不掛在床上摔角，同時透過選擇選項的不同也能獲得差分CG，想要解鎖所有插畫至少要重覆進行三次流程。至於該不該買這款遊戲呢？筆者問你們一個簡單的問題，如果你們認同的話就放心去購買本作吧！試問：你會不會專心閱讀故事劇情，而不是單純的跳過文字純拿CG？回答是否定的話，把你們的錢省下來，視覺小說遊戲不適合你們。

author: {'steamid': '76561198065455947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1434636642}
review:
This is Italian review. Sorry, I don't think I have the ability to write a english review.

-

Per quanto competente come la trama può essere, e attraente come molti troveranno questa Visual Novel, Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1 è estremamente breve. Per essere più precisi e pignoli, ho finito la storia principale in 76 minuti. Questo indica che per chi ha una lettura molto fluida e una conoscenza della lingua Inglese migliore della mia, potrebbe finirlo in meno di un'ora. 
Ci sono diversi eventi che si possono verificare, ma alla fine il risultato è sempre lo stesso, qualsiasi scelta voi fate. 
Come si fa a vedere scene diverse? 
Semplice, rigiocatela più volte. La cosa più bella, al di fuori della storia principale leggermente brebe, è che in questo capitolo di Sakura, ci sono un sacco di scelte da fare. 
Questo è un grande passo dai titoli precedenti, anche se a dire la verità, non sembra ancora che importi più di tanto, dato che la vera storia duri a malapena un film. 
Gli sviluppatori della serie Sakura stanno finalmente creando giochi che forniscono ampie quantità di fanservice e un'interessante trama tutto sommato. Il rilascio di Sakura Fantasy chapter 1 puo' essere considerato come uno slancio della serie, costando la stessa cifra dei titoli precedenti, ed offrendo molto meno dal punto di vista della longevità. 
Se il capitolo 2 non riuscirà ad aumentare quest'ultima caratteristica, per concludersi, la storia, potrebbe richierdere più capitoli del dovuto, anche se il successo ottenuto fino ad ora potrebbe andare in fumo.

PRO
- I disegni, come sempre, sono eccezionali.
- Molte scelte.


CONTRO
- Longevità della storia.
- Scelte che incidono poco sulla trama.


Voto: 7/10

Link alla recensione completa: http://www.phgtech.it/2015/06/sakura-fantasy-chapter-1-recensione.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198063165596', 'num_games_owned': 316, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1434056002}
review:
Sakura Spirit had 'plot'.
Sakura Angels also had 'plot'.

Sakura Fantasy, however, has 'plot' and plot.
There's more choices, boobs, 'situations' and the entire game is a much higher standard. The dialogue is better, the audio is better, and getting rid of the usually awkward, invisible male protagonist for another female means more fanservice. Best decision ever.

The lewd/story ratio is excellently balanced, and yuri means +++.

I also need the 2nd chapter. I need to know what happens next. For... reasons.

No-one can judge me. No-one at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089202580', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1437233020}
review:
I'm going to be honest, this is the first VN I have actually played rather than watched videos of on Youtube and, in my faithful opinion, this is one of THE BEST VN's they have made. There are:
-More Choices to pick from
-Wonderful Character and Background Art
- Better Audio
And the list just goes on. This game has brought me out of my hibernation from games. I truly enjoyed reading through this and actually having to think about the multiple choices it gave you. I also went into the extra's screen and found that some of the images were "Locked" so I also hope to backtrack and choose the right decisions to unlock those certain images; I'm aniticipating it already.
I really hope they can release the next chapter very soon beause the storyline was pure beauty, the emotions and feelings I expressed while playing this game were phenomenal. I actually want to know what will happen next in this game. I'm going to check Greenlight every few days now, I really want the next chapter. Will they find the fallen star? Will the slime monster make a second appearance? Who is "She"? So many questions left unanswered is leaving me begging for the truth. Winged Cloud, you have some great potential and I want you, from the bottom of my heart, to carry on making these beautifully designed and created games. Keep up the good work. ;3

author: {'steamid': '76561198041726894', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 220, 'last_played': 1443388719}
review: Bof, bof, bof,… Le premier opus Sakura Spirits ne m’avait pas du tt convaincu. Le deuxième, Sakura Angels, m’avait fait passser quelques bons moments vu le décalage entre le train-train quotidien du héros et les interventions souvent intempestives de ses deux « anges gardiens ». La première moitié de Sakura FC ne m'a pas du tout convaincu. J’avais l’impression d’être revenus aux errements du premier opus. Après une heure de lecture, j'ai laisé tombé et donné une note négative à Sakura FC. Puis, un soir, crevé suite à une journée de m****, j'ai recommencé à lire Sakura FC pcq je n'avais vraiment pas le courage de m'investir dans une VN ou un jeu un peu plus exigeant.  Et là, peu à peu, l'histoire s'est étoffée, même si, globalement, le scénario reste faible. Ce qui est une constance de la licence Sakura. Mais bon, j'avais quand une histoire à me mettre sous la dent. Le fan-service avec quelques jolies images un peu « hot » a contribué à relevé le niveau et j'ai finalement, de justesse, transformé ma note négative en positive. Je tiens à souligner, de justesse.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006096457', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1503080509}
review:
Although short, this is essentially a prelude to the following chapters. 

The story starts off very slow in my opinion, it's more lewd than story for a little while, not that it's a reason to complain. It does pick up and become interesting, while also balancing the perfect-lewd to story ratio, just as the previous stories did. This is clearly going to be much longer, so a slow start isn't surprising. I'm expecting big things. Chapter 2 allegedly set to release late July.

Good art work, wonderful music, gripping story. Very lewd. 7/10

Recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033640652', 'num_games_owned': 260, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1437680166}
review:
No regrets.

I played the other Sakura Games, this one definately better. It feels alot less contrived, albeit it still pushes the protagonist into 'comprimising' situations quite frequently (more in the second half than first). I enjoyed the actual story (that being: without the yuri parts; enjoyed those too if you know what I mean ;) ) and got frustrated with the protagonist (myself as I like to see it) not trying out a few things with her 'gift' during combat.

Looking forward to the second chapter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020977186', 'num_games_owned': 5008, 'num_reviews': 496, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1434831132}
review: Better than the previous Sakura VNs. It's the usual excuse plot business, but it has some meat to it this time around. As opposed to the cardboard cutouts from the previous Sakura VN's, the characters in Fantasy have personalities and motivations that don't revolve around the player character. It's nothing too complicated, but the writing is better than the previous VNs. Unlike in Sakura Spirit, I didn't have to stop every sentence or so to nurse the subdural haematoma that was forming in my brain, which was a plus. Changing to a female protagonist didn't slow the amount of clueless dopes walking in on others changing, but at least one such occasion results in some dialogue that actually has a point.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081866568', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1434209267}
review:
So i went into this with low expectations more out of trying something new and this had a very positive (96%) so it seemed a good place to star with a visual novel/anime. i'll start by saying that Sakura Fantasy actually has a suprisingly good and well written story with only an few spelling mistakes and a single instance of "well that was convinient", there is no nudity (at least nothing that wouldnt get past youtube or ofcom) though as ever with alot of anime the characters bodies arent of "realistic" proportions if you catch my drift.
Final Verdict: 10/10
good story, meaningful characters, good control interface, no bugs or crashes and brilliant soundtrack.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046516052', 'num_games_owned': 293, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1433471867}
review:
Best story of any of the games yet!

This game has very good pacing and a nice story. When playing though, you'll reach the end rather quickly and be left with a massive hole in the story as this game is(was) meant to have a sequel.

This sequel, as of 12/25/17, has still not been released, so if you aren't going to want to play a game with a major plot hole DO NOT BUY. 

Even with this flaw, it is still a very entertaining game and worth the time if you're ever bored.

7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198111919936', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1434056329}
review:
Before we get on with this review...
Yes i went in it for the boobs and lesbian sex.
I better make this review short since my parents could kick me out at any moment for purchasing this game.
If you're looking for boobs and lesbians being lesbians, then this is the right game for you.
If you're looking for a somewhat decent story that actually makes you somewhat (damn you vines and slime) forget you're playing this boobalicious plot filled game, then this is the right game for you.
If you're looking for chocolate baths, cute girls, sarcastic guardsmen, boobs, and have money to spare, then this is the right game for you.
Honestly, there were times where i enjoyed the non plotfilled scenes and was interested in the situation, environment, and adventure the girls were going on.
But the boobs and partial nudity throughout the game got to be a little overbearing (coming from a lesbian who loves all things boob related) and i couldn't take some scenes seriously, which really dissappointed me.
Overall, i really enjoyed the story and the characters and look foward to the next chapter.
Ok time to pack my things.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000459592', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1440971537}
review:
If you're debating whether to get this game or not it comes down to a simple question. Did you buy, play, and enjoy the other Sakura games? (Spirit, Angels). 
If your answer is yes, you can expect to enjoy this game just as much. If no, don't bother.
Great CG's as always and story and dialogue are typical affair of the Sakura series. A nice change in pace with no male MC, and instead having a female MC for yuri pairings. I appreciate alot the extra choices in game despite their insignificance except for grabbing more CG's. It's really the thought of having more control over the story that counts I suppose.
Over all a great grab for fans of the Sakura games like myself, can't wait for the next chapter!

author: {'steamid': '76561197996664052', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1433594609}
review: This game basically sets that stage for the second part (to be released next month), so you don't get any major story payoffs here, sadly.  The story isn't horrible for what it is... my biggest complaint, honestly, is that the writing can be so cheesey at parts- like how they constantly mention how so-and-so turned around, making her boobs jiggle slightly, and it comes across as awkward.  Also, I found that the choices I made didn't tend to make much of a difference.  You might make one decision only to find that you're forced to make the other decision anyways!

author: {'steamid': '76561198026565056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 603, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1466029778}
review: Sakura Fantasy Chapter 1 is ecchi visual novel. This is the third Sakura in the series and it seems to be a first in the Sakura Fantasy's in an attempt to create a longer story. And the story is is really good so far: you play as Raelin, an aspiring female knight and not a faceless male, who has the special ability to see anyone anywhere. A star falls to earth and you are charged to go retrieve it. Also this game has way more choices than the other two games. The art is pretty much the same. And I give this an 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157486683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1459720701}
review: I thoroughly  enjoyed it from start to finish had a mix of laughs , emotional points , interesting characters and of course its fair share of revealing pics which in my eyes topped the past two games ones and are certainly a nice view. I found and like all the characters and enjoyed finding out about there past and what secrets and all sorts that made them up and even got surprised a little at some points. The decisions are more meaningful and make much more of an impact on the story and can each one can lead you to learn new things, I have only gone through it once and I saw that not all the extra's where ope, this means I am going to be going back through changing the choices up and aiming for them new scenes and new things to learn. Overall loved the game and would recommend to anyone who is fans of the previous games and can't wait for it to continue in future chapters.

review: Reading the other reviews I was kinda expecting PWP (Porn without Plot) and was prepared to be disappointed that I shelled out money for this.. but on the contrary, there's still some substance to this. Yeah, there's still lots of ~plot~ but the actual story isn't too bad either. It does cut off far too early but since this is only chapter one, that's only to be expected. It seems like this would be a great full epic-length VN if you pasted all the chapters together. I'm eagerly waiting for the later chapters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052108016', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1433059472}
review:
I'm sure this is a good game for fans of the genre. I bought it on a whim to see whether I'd like the genre. I would have preferred not to write a negative review out of respect to fans and the devs, especially considering all the positive reviews, but after buying just this one game, Steam now thinks I'm a genre fan and is recommending mostly visual novels. So, unfortunately I have to post a negative review in the hopes that Steam will stop doing that.

The artwork is nice. The music is rather well done. As someone unfamiliar with this genre, I found the story very short and childish, but that's probably the point. Interestingly, the engine they used is open source and written largely in Python, and it actually allows for very complex dialogue branching and other functionality, such as complex animation and even video playback. The devs opted not to use most of those functions apparently. I suppose, again, that is standard for the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142398048', 'num_games_owned': 418, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1433449716}
review:
[h1]Введение:[/h1]
Игра замечательная! По сравнению с 2 предыдущими новеллами, в этой намного больше выбора действий, но концовка вроде одна. Советую покупать вместе с [b]Sakura Spirit[/b] и [b]Sakura Angels[/b] нераздумывая!

[h1]Сюжет:[/h1]
Сюжет, для новелл такого жанра прост: Вы воин, обычный воин. Ваша цель - стать самым п*здатым воином, ака героем. И НЕ ВАЖНО ЧТО ВЫ САМИ ТЯН! Вас ждут тентакли, полу-голые воины-тян, межвременные континуумы, флэшбеки, принцессы и горячие источники (!). Что вы встретите на пути?
1. Цундере-тян: Она вас ненавидит, но течет...
2. Подруга: Она всегда будет рядом, но вам не до неё, так же течет...
3. Похотливая-тян: Клеится к вам и течет не скрывая этого, вы её ненавидете
4. Мрачный тип: Порет чушь, говорит о предначертаном, не течет (!)

[h1]Прочее:[/h1]
Моделей героинь стало вразы больше, классных звуков добавилось, саундтрек радует слух, количество грудей выросло в геометрической прогрессии. Рисовка - это что-то. Как ни крути, но стиль потрясающий, каждый фон проработан превосходно, а персонажи... Ну кароч сиськи есть и это главное!

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Новелла получилась весьма интересной, красивой, [strike]фапабельной[/strike] читабельной. Ждем 2 эпизод!

[b]10 цундере-тян из 10[/b] 

[quote=KennyJRStar!]Жизнь одна - руки две[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198053215015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1433153100}
review:
女の子が国の騎士を目指しながら国の女王やら同僚とイチャイチャするファンタジー百合ゲー。

未だChapter1ということも有りエンディングまで1時間半ほど、まだコンプはしていないが選択肢でセーブすれば2時間ほどでコンプすると思われるのでボリュームは控えめだろうか。
ただし、少ないボリュームの割に選択肢は多く(だが選択肢自体やフラグを立てる難易度は高くない)CGも32枚と少なくはない。

また女の子の素肌を見たいお姉さまと一般人にも配慮しているのかやたら服が脱げたり半裸になる事が多く、もれなくそのシーンになるとCGとして表示される。
そのせいもあるのか、一枚絵が主人公からの視点でヒロインのみしか写っていないものが大半で、めんどくさい百合厨的にはキャラ二人が仲良くしている一枚絵が欲しかった。
単純に街中を手を繋いで歩いていたり、お風呂でもヒロイン一人だけではなく一緒に写っていればより良かったのにと思う。
勿論、百合ゲーという事もあり全く無い事もないのだが…。

と、ネガキャンもしてしまったが百合ゲーと言われるだけ有り女の子同士のパヤパヤも有るし顔が有る男も今の所出てこないので、まず百合好きなら買って後悔はしないと思う。steam百合ゲーの中では今後に期待出来る一本であると言えるのは間違いない。
全編英語なのは辞書と女の子同士の愛で乗り切ろう！ちなみに俺はRaelin×GwynneとRaelin×モブ子が好きです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198032216249', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1433079092}
review: Sakura Fantasy is jetzt der dritte teil der Sakuraa reihe, die haben storie mäßig nichts mit einander zu tun aber der zeichen stiel is unverändert und das ist auch gut so den die charaktere sind alle schön anzusehen. Es gibt viele entscheidungen zu treffen die das geschehen in eine andere richtung lenkt, was sich aber wohl erst in den späteren kapitel deutlicher zum ausdruck bringt. Es ist ein novel das wohl doch mehr für ältere leser geeignet ist den....es geht schnell zur sache, das die charaktere alle samt mehr lesbischer natur sind...ist natürlich nur reihner zufall aber mal was anderes. Ich hatte spaß beil lesen und nach ungefähr 6 stunden ist man mit dem ersten lesen schon fertig, ist aber halt auch ein längeres novel mit mehreren kapiteln die hoffentlich bald erscheinen. Wer die Sakura novel schon gelesen hatt und gefallen dran gefunden hatt solte dieses novel auch lesen, den es ist gut gemacht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085551042', 'num_games_owned': 334, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1433074236}
review:
Sakura Fantasy is quite different from Sakura Angels and Sakura Spirit, because you are playing as a girl and you actually see her on the scene beside other characters. Another difference are decision times, which are much more frequent, which gives you a bit more freedom. It has maybe too much fan service, which sometimes ruin the moment, yet it kind of intensifies the bond between those characters. The story itself will probably really start in chapter 2, since this is kind of foreplay. :P

Still can´t wait for another part :3
Overall rating for me would be 8,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198146779090', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1434203519}
review: After playing the previous 2 with this being the third one that I played/read through. I have to say that is has more of a plot compared to the others, you'll also get to make a lot of choices now which is good thing. Really starting to enjoy it now especially since the plot is much bigger this time than just bewbs and the soundtrack is also very well done. Though my favorite in the series is still Sakura Spirit, mainly for nostalgic purposes and the charming characters. This series might actually be as good as it or maybe even better. It's a little weird how they actually reused some of the character models from Sakura Angels but they made quite a few adjustments so that you will be able to think of them as entirely new characters. Definitely recommend this if you are a big fan of the franchise as I am :) I'm currently waiting for Chpater 2 to be released which should be sometime in July as announced by Winged Cloud. There are also rumors that the next 2 games will be called Sakura Dungeon and Sakura Beach. So there is  a lot to look forward to this year from Winged Cloud.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039337300', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1441671180}
review:
I liked this! It's been a very enjoyable experience. The art is gorgeous, with many *ahem* assets to admire. The story is better than I thought it would be, but it's still pretty standard fare; it serves its purpose though. The music was also well-done. This is a nice little game, worth the price.

Be aware that it is pretty short. I completed it in about 3 and 1/2 hours. There is some replay value, different scenes to unlock, different choices to make.

I'm looking forward to the next chapter!

author: {'steamid': '76561197967599040', 'num_games_owned': 9931, 'num_reviews': 239, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1497836705}
review:
Sakuraシリーズ第三弾「Sakura Fantasy」
今までのSakuraシリーズとは違い、見習い騎士である"女の子"が主人公となっており、仲間の女の子・女教官・女帝(+α)が出てくる百合ゲーとなっている。
選択肢は増え、相変わらず乳首は出ないが肌色率もアップしていて、全体的にボリュームは増えており値段の割に充実した内容となっている。ただし、おっぱいとヒップのテカテカが僅かながらに薄くなったように感じられる。
CG数は全32枚で、種類的には(シースルーも含めて)ほぼ全裸7枚、下着か水着を着用5枚、ビリビリの服3枚、泥およびチョコレート風呂3枚、キスシーン5枚、スライム攻め1枚、その他という構成になっている。
てか、この絵師さんチョコレート風呂大好きだよな・・・俺も好きだけど。
